lead_paragraph: SPIEGEL--Helen. Congregation Rodeph Sholom mourns the death of our beloved member, Helen Speigel, devoted wife of the late Aaron Spiegel. Helen was an integral member of a multi-generational Rodeph Sholom family. We send our deepest condolences to her family, all members of our synagogue, Cindy Spiegel, Peter Kupfer, Rachel and Jonathan and Shari Spiegel, Alan Berliner and Eli. May her memory be a blessing. Robert N. Levine, D.D., Senior Rabbi Martin Flumenbaum, President 1/3
